ARABIC: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّكُمْ وَجَهْرَكُمْ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is Allah in the heavens and in the earth. He knows what you keep secret and what you make public and He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is God in the heavens and the earth. He knows what you hide and bring out into the open, and knows what you earn (of good and evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And He it is Who is One True God in the heavens and in the earth. He knows your deeds - both secret and open - and knows fully whatever you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is God of the heavens and the earth and He knows whatever you conceal, reveal, or gain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He is Allah (the God) of the heavens and in the earth; He knows all, your secrets and your disclosures, and He knows your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He is Allah, in the heavens and the earth, He knows what you conceal and what you reveal, and He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He is Allah in the heavens and in the earth; He knows your secret (thoughts) and your open (words), and He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He is God in the heavens and the earth; He knows your secrets, and what you publish, and He knows what you are earning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He is Allah in the heavens and in the earth. He knoweth both your secret and your utterance, and He knoweth what ye earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is God both in the heavens and on earth. He has knowledge of all that you hide and all that you reveal. He knows what you do;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is Allah in the heavens and the earth; He knoweth your secret and your publishment, and He knoweth that which ye earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He is Allah in the heavens and on the earth: He knows your secret and your overt [matters], and He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He is Allah in the heavens and on earth. He knoweth what ye hide, and what ye reveal, and He knoweth the (recompense) which ye earn (by your deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He is Allah (to be worshipped Alone) in the heavens and on the earth, He knows what you conceal and what you reveal, and He knows what you earn (good or bad).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is Allah in the heavens and earth. He has knowledge of all that you hide and all that you reveal. He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is God in the heavens and the earth. He knows what you keep secret and what you make public; and He knows what you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He is Allah, [the only deity] in the heavens and the earth. He knows your secret and what you make public, and He knows that which you earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:3] He is God, the One worthy of being worshipped, in the heavens and in the earth. He knows your secrets and your utterance, what you keep secret and what you utter openly among yourselves, and He knows what you   earn, what you do of good and evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He is Allah in the heavens) He is the God of the dwellers of heaven (and in the earth) and the God of all the dwellers of the earth. (He knoweth both your secret and your utterance) He says: He knows what you keep hidden in your breasts just as He knows what you make public, (and He knoweth what you earn) of good or evil.
